title: Calories in Just Salad
meta_description: Discover calories in just salad for a basic serving, including macros, fiber, and low-cal tweaks without dressing or extras.
assumptions: Basic mixed green salad with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and carrots; no dressing, cheese, nuts, or added fats. Serving size ≈ 200 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by ingredients, portion size, freshness, and preparation; check labels or apps for custom salads.

quick_answer.text: A basic just salad serving provides ~34 kcal, with high water content and ~3 g fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in just salad without dressing?
faqs.a: About 34 kcal for a 200 g basic serving of greens and veggies.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a plain just salad?
faqs.a: ≈2.8 g protein, 0.4 g fat, 6.6 g carbs (including 2.6 g fiber).

faqs.q: Is just salad low in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 40 mg per serving, but additions like olives can increase it.

faqs.q: How does salad size affect calories?
faqs.a: Larger portions (e.g., 300 g) add ~17 kcal per 100 g; focus on volume for low-cal.

faqs.q: Can I eat just salad for weight loss?
faqs.a: Yes, it's very low-calorie and filling due to fiber, but pair with protein for balance.
